job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Site Reliability Engineer

 

Excellent opportunity to be part of this high growth business unit transforming on premise applications to Google Cloud Platform. 

 

You will work with a dedicated team to design, configure, deploy, and support enterprise applications to GCP in a large, data intensive environment. 

 

RESPONSIBILITIES: 

  • Work with business and IT team to transform enterprise applications from on prem to GCP
  • Design, configure, deploy, and triage applications into production
  • Code deployment utilizing terraform
  • CI/CD 
  • Write scripts, performance monitoring
  • Support and on call duties 
  • Document new processes


This is an excellent 6+ month contract opportunity working with a high growth business unit as they transform to GCP. Outstanding opportunity to learn and grow your skills in a team that is seeking innovation in product and technology. Potential for conversion to full time employment. Ideally in Saint Louis or Atlanta but you can work 100% remotely. 

 

REQUIRED SKILLS:

  • 5+ years as an SRE - Site Reliability Engineer 
  • GCP - 1 year - experience deploying code to cloud platforms
  • Experience deploying/supporting .Net/C# applications 
  • Windows and related scripting skills in PowerShell, Python, or Bash
  • Knowledge of CI/CD, Jenkins pipelines
  • Excellent troubleshooting skills and a problem-solver mindset

  

PREFERRED SKILLS:

  • Kubernetes - certifications 
  • GKE 
  • AppDynamics
